messages.messageBody:
> I'm trashing the all the old curricula and crap we have and my 9yo says
"Can
> I scratch up my cd's?"
>
> (alpha omega 4th grade cd's). Poor thing hated them. So, she's out there
> now stomping on them joyfully. Feels so good.

Once she's scratched up as many as she wants, you might want to save some.
They make great mobiles, and they keep birds away from fruit when you hang
them in the bushes or trees.
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary
saftety deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...
